Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: イーフォンの聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Eephon

Entry.JapaneseText: イーフォンの聖殿
Entry.EnglishText: Shrine of Eephon

Entry.JapaneseText: ゼレン湿原の泉
Entry.EnglishText: Zeren Wetlands Spring

Entry.JapaneseText: ゼレン湿原の泉
Entry.EnglishText: Zeren Wetlands Spring

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなものが泉の底に 隠されていたとは……
Entry.EnglishText: To think that something like this was hidden beneath the spring...

Entry.JapaneseText: この先に、<Blue>闇の力<White>が あるというのか……!?
Entry.EnglishText: So this means that the <Blue>Power of Shade<White> lies up ahead?

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなものがあるのに、 ナニもないってコトは ないんじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: Well there's no way a place like this <Italic>wouldn't</Italic> have something inside of it, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Blue>闇の力<White>を求めし者たちよ……
Entry.EnglishText: You who seek the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 今の声は……!?
Entry.EnglishText: Whose voice was that...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>闇の力<White>を得て何を望む。
Entry.EnglishText: What wish would you have come true if you were to obtain the <Blue>Power of Shade<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 声の主よ、我々は世界に満ちた 悪しき<Blue>思念<White>を消し、 人々の争いを止めるために <Yellow>聖者の力<White>を必要としています。
Entry.EnglishText: Whomever you may be... We wish to purge the evil <Yellow>scourge<White> which has invaded this world, and put an end to the conflict of our people. For that, we need the <Yellow>Saint's Power<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたが、 その聖者なのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Would you happen to be one of the <Yellow>Saints<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>の争いは、 <Blue>思念<White>のもたらすものなのか。 <Blue>思念<White>の前に、 <Yellow>ヒト<White>は争う事はなかったか。
Entry.EnglishText: Are the conflicts of <Yellow>Humans<White> born from the <Blue>Will<White>? Before the <Blue>Will<White>, did <Yellow>Humankind<White> know not of conflict?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>は今、古と同じ過ちを 繰り返さんとしている。 あるいは、ふたつの種族の争いは 続いていたのではあるまいか。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Humans<White> of now are merely repeating the mistakes of yore. Or perhaps, is this not a continuation of that same conflict?

Entry.JapaneseText: 相容れぬ間柄ならば、 どちらかが滅ぶまで争えば良い。 さすれば争いの種は消える。
Entry.EnglishText: If the relationship between the two races is irreconcilable, then it would be wise to let it continue until one side has perished. Only then shall the seeds of conflict be no more.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなのって…… ひどい……
Entry.EnglishText: How could you say such a thing...? That's horrible...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの娘よ、本当にそう思うか。 汝は、ガジュマを憎んでいるのでは なかったか。
Entry.EnglishText: Young Huma, is that what you truly believe? Do you not harbor hatred for Gajuma within your heart?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おまえはゲオルギアスの手先か。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Are you one of Geyorkias's underlings?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはゲオルギアスの手先かって 聞いてんだよ、このヤロウッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Well, are you?! I asked you a damn question, so answer it!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとかガジュマとか 種族なんて関係ねぇ!! おれたちは、同じ<Yellow>ヒト<White>として 今までうまくやって来たんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Huma, Gajuma, race doesn't matter! We'd been getting along with each other until now because we were all part of the same <Yellow>Human<White> race!

Entry.JapaneseText: ゲオルギアスが…… <Blue>思念<White>ってヤツが ブチ壊そうとしてるんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: But Geyorkias...and his stupid <Blue>Will<White> are trying to take that from us!

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当にヒューマとガジュマは 同じだと思っているのか。
Entry.EnglishText: You truly believe that Huma and Gajuma are one and the same?

Entry.JapaneseText: <scale:180><Cyan>同じ<White>だ!!<color:100>
Entry.EnglishText: <scale:180>THEY ARE THE <Cyan>SAME<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたが<Yellow>聖者<White>で、 <Blue>闇の力<White>が<Yellow>聖者の力<White>なら、 そいつでゲオルギアスの<Blue>思念<White>を 消せば、すぐにわかる事だぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: And if you're one of the <Yellow>Saints<White>, and the <Yellow>Power of Shade<White> is the <Yellow>Power of the Saints<White>, when we use that power to get rid of Geyorkias's <Blue>Will<White>, you'll understand that right away!

Entry.JapaneseText: ならば我の元に来るが良い。 そして、示せ。 汝の信じるものを。
Entry.EnglishText: Then come before me, and show me. Show me what it is that you believe.

Entry.JapaneseText: やってやろうじゃねえか!! みんな、行こうぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Then let's get this show on the road! C'mon, guys!

Entry.JapaneseText: さて、次の聖獣だが、 どこへ行けばいいんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Okay, where to now if we're going to find the next Sacred Beast?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……陽炎の荒野か…… 思い当たる場所といえば、 クロダダク砂漠…… あるいはツルベナ荒野……
Entry.EnglishText: A wasteland amidst a shimmering haze, hm... The first thing that comes to mind is the Kurodadaku Desert... There's also the Crvena Wasteland.
Entry.Notes: Correct spelling of Crvena according to Term sheet but flagged by QA.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたんだ、<Hilda>？
Entry.EnglishText: Something up, <Hilda>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……どうして……あなたなの……？ どうして……私じゃないの？ 私には聖獣の力が必要なのに……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Why you? Why not me? When I'm the one who needs the power of a Sacred Beast...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何をそんなにカリカリしてんだ？ らしくないぜ、<Hilda>？
Entry.EnglishText: What's got you so grouchy? It's not like you, <Hilda>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたたちには わからないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...It's nothing any of you would understand.

Entry.JapaneseText: 次の行き先だけど…… ツルベナ荒野かもしれないなら、 ピピスタはどうかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, as for our next destination... Supposing we head for the Crvena Wasteland, how about stopping by Pipista?

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ？
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ、ツルベナ荒野の近くにある村で、 ピピスタは、古代カレギア語で 「鳥の巣」を意味するわ。 <Blue>眠れる翼<White>と関係ありそうじゃない？
Entry.EnglishText: It's a town near the wasteland. In Ancient Callegean, "Pipista" means "bird's nest." It might be connected to those <Blue>Sleeping Wings<White>, don't you think?

Entry.JapaneseText: うむ、調べてみる価値はありそうだな。 ひとまずピピスタへ向かおう。
Entry.EnglishText: Hm, it might be a good idea to pay it a visit. Let's head on over there.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
